assertion: I once spent the night in a bush in Basingstoke.
At school, I used to regularly pay my friend to clean my rubbers.
I deliberately tripped him up during the wheelbarrow race at my son's sports day.
For six months, he was my sworn enemy when a practical joke got out of hand.
I once took him home from nursery instead of my own son.
I recently ended up in A&E after attempting to use a sledgehammer to crack a nut.
